entry.definition: The included document uses a MINIMUM profile
The included document uses a Basic Without Lines profile
The included document uses a Basic profile
entry.usage: Applicable in Factur-X/ZUGFeRD and Order-X. For Factur-X/ZUGFeRD the BASIC profile is compliant to the EN16931.

entry.definition: The included document uses a Comfort profile
The included document uses a EN 16931 profile
entry.usage: Only applicable in Factur-X/ZUGFeRD. This profile is compliant to the EN16931.

entry.definition: The included document uses a Comfort profile
entry.usage: Applicable in Factur-X/ZUGFeRD and Order-X. For Factur-X/ZUGFeRD the EXTENDED profile is compliant to and conformant extension of the EN16931.

entry.definition: The included document uses an XRECHNUNG profile
